mapper.select: select * from dict_language order by language_id asc

SELECT a.pair_id,b.language_id source_lang_id,b.class_name source_class_name,c.language_id target_lang_id,c.class_name target_class_name FROM dict_language_pair a INNER JOIN dict_language b ON a.source_lang = b.language_id AND a.pair_id = #{pair_id} INNER JOIN dict_language c ON a.target_lang = c.language_id

SELECT a.pair_id,b.language_id source_lang_id,b.class_name source_class_name,c.language_id target_lang_id,c.class_name target_class_name FROM dict_language_pair a INNER JOIN dict_language b ON a.source_lang = b.language_id INNER JOIN dict_language c ON a.target_lang = c.language_id
